Unclegut: What media did you use? I burned mine on a Samsung pleomax dvd-r. Perhaps that is the problem. Anyway, I got it to work a little now, but the loading times are immense (like 10 minutes every time it loads) and the videos are unwatchable, they freeze every two seconds and have no sound. Crap, I hope there will be a PAL release of this game too, hopefully it will work better for me...
believe it or not i use maxell dvd-r. i havent had a bad burn with maxell yet.... i use dvd decrypter as well as alcohol 120 and sometimes nero. i've had excellent results using all three
